N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 191.7 - Application for determining a child safety zone

State Regulations
_____________________________________________________________________________
Pursuant to section
3635-b
of the

Education Law, a petition shall be submitted in order to request that the Board
of Education investigate the need to establish a Child Safety Zone for the
purpose of transporting students to and from school. The petition shall contain a minimum of 25 qualified voters
of the school district or five percent of the number of voters who voted in the
previous annual election of the members of the Board of Education, whichever is
greater. For requests that designates an area/neighborhood, please
submit the application as a package for the entire neighborhood or area to be
affected. The package shall contain the petition and application for each
family requesting transportation. _____________________________________________________________________________

include the residence where the student(s) reside, location of the school that
the student(s) attend, and the route the student(s) travel to and from school. Please indicate all street names and route numbers along the
